author: Aaron Weaver
title: Twitter Is Enraged That Bill Maher Has a Point About ‘Chinese Virus’
description: Bill Maher just released a new segment where he points out that we name viruses based on where they originate, and 'woke' Twitter can't handle it. The post Twitter Is Enraged That Bill Maher Has a Point About ‘Chinese Virus’ appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Bill Maher is trending on Twitter after releasing a segment defending the logic of calling the coronavirus, the China virus.
  • Woke Twitter is up in arms over the segment.
  • Bill Maher makes a valid point, and Twitter cant stand it.
